description: Summary dashboard of all relevant metrics

targets.expr: sum(sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu", unit="core"}) by (pod) * on (pod) group_left sum(kube_pod_status_phase{phase!~"Failed|Succeeded"}>0) by (pod)) / sum(kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="cpu", unit="core"}) * 100

sum(sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory", unit="byte"}) by (pod) * on (pod) group_left sum(kube_pod_status_phase{phase!~"Failed|Succeeded"}>0) by (pod)) / sum(kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="memory", unit="byte"}) * 100

title: Overview
